details.job_name: A placeholder variable for the job name
details.job_queue: A placeholder variable for the job queue
details.job_workspace: A placeholder variable for the job workspace
details.current: A placeholder variable for the current time
details.gpu_per_node: A placeholder variable for the number of GPUs per node
details.nodes: A placeholder variable for the number of nodes
details.cores_per_node: A placeholder variable for the number of cores per node
details.ram_size: A placeholder variable for the amount of RAM in MB
details.use_gpu: A placeholder variable indicating whether to use GPUs
details.run_time: A placeholder variable for the job runtime
details.ENV_JOB_ID: The PBS job ID without the '.' suffix
